name: Wheel Driving: Car Climb Game
description:
Wheels is One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving game ever made!

Wheels offers an exhilarating mix of amazing tracks and intense challenges. Feel the speed as you negotiate your way through the deadly survival courses. Perform death defying wild stunts, witness bone cracking impacts and lose a limb or few, and take it to the extreme!

Now it’s time to start a Wheel experiment! Forget about Wheel dummies and mannequins - wreck, smash, destroy and dismount all sorts of cartoon cars, machines and obstacles using stickmen instead of your ragdolls playing this ultimate Wheel! Perform different tricks and stunts, crash into the walls, destroy vehicles and have fun demolishing everything on your way!

Game Features:
- Dozens of challenging levels and more to come
- Simple controls but hard to master
- Wide range of different vehicles and obstacles to crash
- Upgradeable vehicles
- Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation
- Realistic crash physics and crunchy sound effects
- Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices

Wish you have a good time to enjoy our wheel.
